text: Frederick Azzopardi (15 September 1949 â€“ 17 October 2020) was a Maltese politician. He was Member of Parliament, Government Deputy Whip, and Parliamentary Assistant in the Ministry of Gozo within the Maltese Government. He was elected in the House of Representatives of Malta in 1998. Azzopardi died on 17 October 2020 at the age of 71 following an illness. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biographical data Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Maltese politicians
title: Frederick Azzopardi
